abstract: Memo From Thailand; Thai economy is in prolonged rut, and conditions have begun to take toll on national mood; residents of once prosperous country blame military-led government, who took control in 2014 after years of political upheaval, for creating  austerity conditions including huge uptick in crime, steep household indebtedness, and retaliations against political dissenters.
lead_paragraph: Thailand was once the torchbearer of freedom and prosperity in Southeast Asia. But now when Thais look to their neighbors, they feel envy, not pity.

headline.main: Thai Economy and Spirits Are Sagging
headline.print_headline: Thai Economy Is Sagging, and So Are Thai Spirits

snippet: Thailand was once the torchbearer of freedom and prosperity in Southeast Asia. But now when Thais look to their neighbors, they feel envy, not pity.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
